name: When I die (3 week first solo dev project)
name_original: When I die (3 week first solo dev project)
description:
3-week university project where I set myself to make a platform game on my own.

everything is mine except the type which is bastelur from https://velvetyne.fr/fonts/basteleur/

d - right

a - left

w - jump

e - interact

left mouse button - select buttons
